The surf.store Module¶

class surf.store.Store(reader=None, writer=None, *args, **kwargs)¶

The plugin manager, also provides convenience methods for working with plugins

add_triple(s=None, p=None, o=None, context=None)¶
add a triple to the store, with the specified context, None can be used as a wildcard
all(concept, limit=None, offset=None)¶
returns all uri’s that are instances of concept within [limit,limit+offset]
clear(context=None)¶
empty the store
concept(resource)¶
returns the concept URI of the following resource, resource can be a string or a URIRef
execute(query)¶
execute a query of type surf.query.Query
execute_sparql(sparql_query)¶
execute a SPARQL query as a string
get(resource, attribute, direct)¶
returns the value(s) of the corresponding attribute
index_triples(**kwargs)¶
performs index of the triples if such functionality is present returns True if operation successfull
instances(resource, direct, filter, predicates)¶
instances_by_attribute(resource, attributes, direct)¶
returns all uri’s that are instances of concept that have the attributes
instances_by_value(resource, direct, attributes)¶
is_present(resource)¶
True if the resource is present in the store, False otherwise
load(resource, direct)¶
fully loads the resource from the store, returns all statements about the resource
load_triples(**kwargs)¶
loads triples from supported sources if such functionality is present returns True if operation successfull
remove(resource)¶
completly remove the resource from the store
remove_triple(s=None, p=None, o=None, context=None)¶
remove a triple from the store, with the specified context None can be used as a wildcard
save(resource)¶
replace the resource with it’s current state
set_triple(s=None, p=None, o=None, context=None)¶
replace a triple in the store, with the specified context None can be used as a wildcard
size()¶
returns the size in triples, that are contained in the current store
update(resource)¶
update the current resource
